comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.body:
"svn diff" for the testcase and patch.

Q: for future patches,  should the diffs be in one file or multiple files?

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.body: Yonik - thanks for the patch!  It has been applied.

description:
SnowballFilter doesn't set the token position increment (and thus it defaults to 1).
This also affetcs SnowballAnalyzer since it uses SnowballFilter.
